key.name: allowed-mime-types
key.description: These are the mime types that the daemon will recognise as valid files to load and use for backgrounds.
key.summary: Allowed mime types for loading backgrounds

key.name: auto-start
key.description: When enabled, the daemon will be automatically started when the extension is loaded. If it is already running or this is disabled, no action will be taken.
key.summary: Automatically start the daemon when the extension loads

key.name: current-profile
key.description: This is the current profile that the daemon will load.

key.name: debug
key.description: When enabled, the entire extension will output a lot more debugging information. This should only be used when needed as it can greatly increase log size.
key.summary: Enable debugging output of the extension

key.name: icon-preview
key.description: If this is enabled and the daemon is running, the icon of the extension will change to a small preview of the next wallpaper to be displayed.
key.summary: Show preview of next wallpaper for extension icon

key.name: integrate-system-menu
key.description: If this is enabled the extension will integrate itself in with the system menu and display a compressed version of controls there. If it is disabled, the extension will have its own icon and show all available functionality.
key.summary: Integrate the extension in with the system menu

key.name: interval
key.description: When timer is enabled, the interval is the amount of time in seconds between the daemon switching the wallpaper to the next available wallpaper. Default is 300 seconds or 5 minutes
key.summary: Number of seconds between wallpaper changes

key.name: next-wallpaper
key.description: Keyboard shortcut to cause the daemon to display the next wallpaper.

key.name: notifications
key.description: Display a notification each time an event happens with desk-changer. This does not stop the extension from reporting errors.

key.name: previous-wallpaper
key.description: Keyboard shortcut to cause the daemon to display the previous wallpaper.

key.name: profiles
key.description: These are all the available profiles. By default, it contains a single profile that will recursively load /usr/share/backgrounds

key.name: profile-state
key.description: This is the storage location of the profile's last state. By default, there are no states saved until a new profile is loaded.

key.name: random
key.description: If set to true the daemon will randomize the order in which the wallpapers are displayed
key.summary: Display wallpapers in a random order

key.name: remember-profile-state
key.description: When enabled, the daemon will remember its current and next wallpaper for the current profile when the profile is changed. This means returning back to the profile will restore the previous background plus the next in queue.
key.summary: Remember profile last wallpaper on load

key.name: rotation
key.description: Choose how the rotation is handled by the daemon. The fiveminute choice is the default. It enables a timer that uses the interval value to change the wallpaper ever 300 seconds or 5 minutes. For hourly and daily, the wallpaper will be changed at the beginning of every hour of the day. When disabled, rotation is not done by the daemon, but only by user interaction with the extension.
key.summary: Different options to control when the wallpaper is changed
